meanings.definition: The combining of two or more companies into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The mergers of two big companies created a new powerful corporation.
meanings.sent2: The mergers in the business world can lead to changes in market dynamics.
meanings.sent3: At the company party, the cake and ice cream had a merger, becoming a delicious dessert combo.
meanings.sent4: The mergers of talent and resources can result in innovative products.
meanings.sent5: The mergers of colors in the painting made it vibrant and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: The act of merging or the state of being merged.
meanings.sent1: After the mergers of the two rivers, the water flow increased significantly.
meanings.sent2: The mergers of ideas in the brainstorming session led to a breakthrough solution.
meanings.sent3: The mergers of flavors in the dish created a unique taste that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The mergers of emotions in the movie scene touched the audience deeply.
meanings.sent5: The mergers of sounds in the symphony orchestra produced a harmonious melody.
